subject: refactor(api): restructure from standalone server to Vercel serverless functions
body:
Replaced the standalone Node.js HTTP server with Vercel-compatible
serverless functions. The API can now be deployed to Vercel with
`vercel --prod` from the api/ directory.

Key changes:
- api/api/send-interest.ts: Vercel serverless function for email sending
- api/api/health.ts: Health check endpoint
- api/vercel.json: Vercel build configuration
- Removed in-memory rate limiting (doesn't persist across serverless
  invocations) â€” CORS + honeypot + Vercel DDoS protection is sufficient
  for a personal CV site
- Updated docs with Vercel deployment instructions
